00179                                 function moduleContent()        {
00180                                         switch((string)$this->MOD_SETTINGS['function']) {
00181                                                 case 1:
00182                                                         $content='<div align="center"><strong>Hello World!</strong></div><br />
00183                                                                 The "Kickstarter" has made this module automatically, it contains a default framework for a backend module but apart from that it does nothing useful until you open the script '.substr(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus'),strlen(PATH_site)).$pathSuffix.'index.php and edit it!
